lead: Camden is currently accepting new cello students of all levels.
intro: As an assistant conductor and chamber music coach at Boston Youth Symphony Orchestras, Camden brings a wealth of experience in musical education. His teaching philosophy emphasizes technical excellence, musical expression, and creative programming.

features.title: Private Lessons
features.description: One-on-one instruction tailored to each student's goals and abilities, from beginners to advanced players

features.title: Chamber Music Coaching
features.description: Ensemble coaching drawing from experience with world-class chamber musicians

features.title: Performance Preparation
features.description: Audition and recital preparation with insights from performances at Carnegie Hall and beyond

features.title: Theory & Musicianship
features.description: Comprehensive musical education incorporating history, theory, and interpretation

credentials: Camden studied with distinguished pedagogues including **Joel Krosnick, Paul Katz, Sieun Lin, and Adam Grabois**, and currently studies with **David Finckel and Nina Lee** at The Juilliard School. He holds a B.A. in History from Harvard University.
